DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial study ultrasound tomography use SoftVue diagnose woman breast cancer . New diagnostic procedure , ultrasound tomography use SoftVue , may help find diagnose breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Tomography Using SoftVue Diagnosing Women With Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Determine in-vivo image potential SoftVue 3-dimensional ( 3-D ) breast imaging . II . Acquire data SoftVue evaluation cohort 100 woman receive standard ultrasound ( US ) evaluation follow-up mammographic palpable abnormality construct reflection , sound speed attenuation image SoftVue . III . Evaluate ability SoftVue detect dominant breast finding ( i.e . major normal landmark architecture ) mass previously identify standard diagnostic evaluation ( palpation , mammography , standard US ) use standard clock position radial distance measurement nipple . IV . Conduct tomographic ( i.e . slice-by-slice ) comparison SoftVue magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) finding subgroup 50 patient . OUTLINE : Patients undergo ultrasound tomography use SoftVue . Some patient also undergo MRI breast .
DOC.criteria: Scheduled mammogram , breast ultrasound and/or breast MRI Breast size le 22 cm diameter ( ring diameter 22cm ) Able read understand provide inform consent Weight < 350lbs ( patient bed max weight ) Nonpregnant nonlactating No open breast chest wound No active skin infection No serious medical psychiatric illness would prevent informed consent
